item.description:
Get back on the bandwagon and join us in our 2008 resolution to use Ruby in all appropriate ways...and invent some new ones!

This months (very loose) agenda is:

1) Welcome to new people.
2) "What I love and hate about soap4r, and why I don't use it any more."
3) Ruby 1.9, a look at some new features. (Tyler!)
4) Lightning talks (If anyone has one they want to present.)
5) Open problem solving. (Bring your questions and code you need help with.)
6) Show and Tell. (Bring anything you want to share.)

We have Pizza again...so let me know if there is anything you must have / are allergic to. Anchovies are NEVER an option. Sorry.

See you next week!
item.how_to_find_us: You can't miss me. I'm loud and large. :)
item.why: Ruby noobies can bring any problem/question and get ideas for solutions, or just downright solve it. Ruby experts have lots of opportunities to share their expertise, gain a fan-base, and move forward with their plans of world domination! Huzzah!
item.name: Meetup For January. Let's be resolute for 2008!
